DataElement.preferredName: Study Staff Drug Diary Not Verified Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text description of why the study staff did not fully verify and sign off on the pill diary.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Staff Pharmacologic Substance Subject Diary Negation Verification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task._Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances._An instrument used either to capture a subject's condition or symptoms, or to monitor compliance during a clinical trial or disease treatment while away from the clinical site._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Support or establish by evidence or proof.

Property.preferredName: Pharmacologic Substance Subject Diary Negation Verification
Property.preferredDefinition: Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.:An instrument used either to capture a subject's condition or symptoms, or to monitor compliance during a clinical trial or disease treatment while away from the clinical site.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Support or establish by evidence or proof.

Concepts.definition: Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.
An instrument used either to capture a subject's condition or symptoms, or to monitor compliance during a clinical trial or disease treatment while away from the clinical site.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Support or establish by evidence or proof.
